abstract: Los Angeles Lakers re-sign forward Metta World Peace, 15-year NBA veteran who has been out of league since February 2014, when New York Knicks waived him; other NBA news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Lakers re-signed forward Metta World Peace, who won a championship with the Lakers in 2010 when he was still known as Ron Artest.

headline.main: World Peace Returns to Los Angeles

snippet: The Los Angeles Lakers re-signed forward Metta World Peace, who won a championship with the Lakers in 2010 when he was still known as Ron Artest.
